articles.title: Explainer: Why are Singapore's fuel pump prices at record highs and what does it mean for the economy? - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Fuel prices at the pump have risen to their highest level on record in recent weeks, in the midst of an unabated hike in global crude oil prices due to a supply crunch and geopolitical turmoil in Europe.
articles.content: Should armed conflict break out between Ukraine and oil-producing Russia, which also supplies oil to Europe, the price of crude oil and its refined products such as petrol will undoubtedly rise, expe… [+5545 chars]
